title: Make all Dialog overlays and panels fully opaque solid white

requirements.summary: Force all shadcn/Radix Dialog overlays to render as fully opaque solid white with no blur so the underlying page is never visible while a modal is open.
acceptanceCriteria: When any modal dialog is opened (e.g., Add Resident, Edit Resident, Add/Edit Medication, Add MAR, Add ADL, Add Daily Vitals, Add Weight), the full-screen overlay is pure solid white and fully opaque (no translucency).
With a modal open, the page behind it is not visible through the overlay.
There is no backdrop blur effect on the dialog overlay.

file_operations.description: Add global CSS overrides targeting Radix/shadcn Dialog overlay elements (e.g., the overlay data-attributes) to enforce a solid white, fully opaque background and to explicitly disable any blur/backdrop-filter. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

If this stylesheet is part of the active Tailwind/CSS import chain in this project, mirror the same Dialog overlay overrides here to ensure consistent behavior across builds/environments. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Audit all app dialog usages and ensure every DialogContent panel uses a fully opaque solid white background by removing any opacity/alpha Tailwind background utilities from dialog containers.
acceptanceCriteria: All DialogContent panels render with a solid white background in both light and dark modes (no alpha backgrounds).
No dialog panel uses Tailwind `opacity-*` utilities or alpha color syntax (e.g., `bg-*/xx`) that results in visible transparency.
Visual regression check: opening each of the existing dialogs shows a consistent solid white panel and solid white overlay.

file_operations.description: Add global CSS overrides targeting Radix/shadcn Dialog content elements (e.g., the DialogContent data-attributes) to force an opaque solid white panel background regardless of light/dark theme variables. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
